description: Causes the target's vision to be obscured, making it harder for them to see.
effect: Blind M% for D seconds
name: Blind

description: Increases the target's encumbrance by M points for D seconds.
effect: Burden M points for D seconds
name: Burden

description: Removes the effects of Blight Diseases from the target.
effect: Cure Blight Disease
name: Cure Blight Disease

description: Removes the effects of Common Diseases from the target.
effect: Cure Common Disease
name: Cure Common Disease

description: Cures the target of the effects of Paralyzation.
effect: Cure Paralyzation
name: Cure Paralyzation

description: Dispels any long-duration Poison effects currently affecting the target.
effect: Cure Poison
name: Cure Poison

description: Permanently lowers the Fatigue of the target by M points. If the target's Fatigue is reduced below 0, they will pass out and collapse to the ground.
effect: Damage Fatigue M points
name: Damage Fatigue

description: Permanently lowers the Health of the target by M points. Note that this does not affect maximum health.
effect: Damage Health M points
name: Damage Health

description: Permanently lowers the intelligence of the target by M points for D seconds.
effect: Damage Intelligence M points for D seconds
name: Damage Intelligence

description: Permanently lowers the Magicka of the target by M points.
effect: Damage Magicka M points for D seconds
name: Damage Magicka

description: Causes you to detect all Animals in the vicinity.
effect: Detect Animal M feet for D seconds
name: Detect Animal

description: Causes you to detect all Enchantments in the vicinity.
effect: Detect Enchantment M feet for D seconds
name: Detect Enchantment

description: Causes you to detect all Keys in the vicinity.
effect: Detect Key M feet for D seconds
name: Detect Key

description: Cancels all temporary magic effects.
effect: Dispel
name: Dispel

description: Temporarily lowers the target's Alteration attribute.
effect: Drain Alteration
name: Drain Alteration

description: Temporarily lowers the target's Agility attribute.
effect: Drain Agility
name: Drain Agility

description: Temporarily lowers the target's Endurance attribute.
effect: Drain Endurance
name: Drain Endurance

description: Temporarily lowers the target's Fatigue attribute.
effect: Drain Fatigue
name: Drain Fatigue

description: Temporarily lowers the target's Health attribute.
effect: Drain Health
name: Drain Health

description: Temporarily lowers the target's Intelligence attribute.
effect: Drain Intelligence
name: Drain Intelligence

description: Temporarily lowers the target's Luck attribute.
effect: Drain Luck
name: Drain Luck

description: Temporarily lowers the target's Magicka attribute.
effect: Drain Magicka
name: Drain Magicka

description: Temporarily lowers the target's Personality attribute.
effect: Drain Personality
name: Drain Personality

description: Temporarily lowers the target's Speed attribute.
effect: Drain Speed
name: Drain Speed

description: Temporarily lowers the target's Strength attribute.
effect: Drain Strength
name: Drain Strength

description: Temporarily lowers the target's Willpower attribute.
effect: Drain Willpower
name: Drain Willpower

description: Reduces the target's encumbrance by M points.
effect: Feather M points for D seconds
name: Feather

description: Provides M% Resist Fire and damages enemies next to the target by 1 point of Fire damage per 10 points spell strength each time they successfully hit the target with a melee attack.
effect: Fire Shield M points for D seconds
name: Fire Shield

description: Temporarily raises the target's Agility attribute by M points for D seconds.
effect: Fortify Agility M points for D seconds
name: Fortify Agility

description: Temporarily raises the target's Attack attribute by M points for D seconds.
effect: Fortify Attack M points for D seconds
name: Fortify Attack

description: Temporarily raises the target's Endurance attribute by M points for D seconds.
effect: Fortify Endurance M points for D seconds
name: Fortify Endurance

description: Temporarily raises the target's Fatigue attribute by M points for D seconds.
effect: Fortify Fatigue M points for D seconds
name: Fortify Fatigue

description: Temporarily raises the target's Health attribute by M points for D seconds.
effect: Fortify Health M points for D seconds
name: Fortify Health

description: Temporarily raises the target's Intelligence attribute by M points for D seconds.
effect: Fortify Intelligence M points for D seconds
name: Fortify Intelligence

description: Temporarily raises the target's Luck attribute by M points for D seconds.
effect: Fortify Luck M points for D seconds
name: Fortify Luck

description: Temporarily raises the target's Magicka attribute by M points for D seconds.
effect: Fortify Magicka M points for D seconds
name: Fortify Magicka

description: Increases the Intelligence multiplier used to determine the target's maximum Magicka.
effect: Fortify Maximum Magicka M/10 x INT
name: Fortify Maximum Magicka

description: Temporarily raises the target's Personality attribute by M points for D seconds.
effect: Fortify Personality M points for D seconds
name: Fortify Personality

description: Temporarily raises the target's Speed attribute by M points for D seconds.
effect: Fortify Speed M points for D seconds
name: Fortify Speed

description: Temporarily raises the target's Strength attribute by M points for D seconds.
effect: Fortify Strength M points for D seconds
name: Fortify Strength

description: Temporarily raises the target's Willpower attribute by M points for D seconds.
effect: Fortify Willpower M points for D seconds
name: Fortify Willpower

description: Causes M points of Frost damage for D seconds.
effect: Frost Damage M points for D seconds
name: Frost Damage

description: Provides M% Resist Frost and damages enemies next to the target by 1 point of Frost damage per 10 points spell strength each time they successfully hit the target with a melee attack.
effect: Frost Shield M points for D seconds
name: Frost Shield

description: Causes the target to become completely invisible and undetectable for the duration of the spell.
effect: Invisibility for D seconds
name: Invisibility

description: Causes the target to be able to walk on air. Speed is determined by the value M and the character's Speed attribute.
effect: Levitate M points for D seconds
name: Levitate

description: Creates a glowing light of M magnitude around the target. Also effects any valid target within A feet.
effect: Light M points for D seconds in A feet
name: Light

description: Provides M% Resist Shock and damages enemies next to the target by 1 point of Shock damage per 10 points spell strength each time they successfully hit the target with a melee attack.
effect: Lightning M points for D seconds Shield
name: Lightning Shield

description: Causes the target to be able to see in the dark.
effect: Night Eye M points for D seconds
name: Night Eye

description: Causes the target to become completely immobile for the duration of the spell.
effect: Paralyze for D seconds
name: Paralyze

description: Damages the target with M points Poison damage for D seconds.
effect: Poison M points for D seconds
name: Poison

description: Instantly transports the target to the location placed by the Mark spell.
effect: Recall
name: Recall

description: Gives a M% chance that spells directed at the target will be reflected back to their caster.
effect: Reflect M% for D seconds
name: Reflect

description: Descreases the M% of damage dealt by Resist Disease. At 100%, the target is immune.
effect: Resist Common Disease M% for D seconds
name: Resist Common Disease

description: Descreases M% of the damage dealt by Fire. At 100%, the target is immune.
effect: Resist Fire M% for D seconds
name: Resist Fire

description: Descreases M% of the damage dealt by Frost. At 100%, the target is immune.
effect: Resist Frost M% for D seconds
name: Resist Frost

description: Descreases M% of the damage dealt by Magicka. At 100%, the target is immune.
effect: Resist Magicka M% for D seconds
name: Resist Magicka

description: Descreases M% of the damage dealt by Paralysis. At 100%, the target is immune.
effect: Resist Paralysis M% for D seconds
name: Resist Paralysis

description: Descreases M% of the damage dealt by Poison. At 100%, the target is immune.
effect: Resist Poison M% for D seconds
name: Resist Poison

description: Descreases M% of the damage dealt by Shock. At 100%, the target is immune.
effect: Resist Shock M% for D seconds
name: Resist Shock

description: Returns the target's Agility attribute to its normal value.
effect: Restore Agility M points for D seconds
name: Restore Agility

description: Returns the target's Endurance attribute to its normal value.
effect: Restore Endurance M points for D seconds
name: Restore Endurance

description: Returns the target's Fatigue attribute to its normal value.
effect: Restore Fatigue M points for D seconds
name: Restore Fatigue

description: Returns the target's Health attribute to its normal value.
effect: Restore Health M points for D seconds
name: Restore Health

description: Returns the target's Intelligence attribute to its normal value.
effect: Restore Intelligence M points for D seconds
name: Restore Intelligence

description: Returns the target's Luck attribute to its normal value.
effect: Restore Luck M points for D seconds
name: Restore Luck

description: Returns the target's Magicka M points per second for the duration of its effect.
effect: Restore Magicka M points for D seconds
name: Restore Magicka

description: Returns the target's Personality attribute to its normal value.
effect: Restore Personality M points for D seconds
name: Restore Personality

description: Returns the target's Speed attribute to its normal value.
effect: Restore Speed M points for D seconds
name: Restore Speed

description: Returns the target's Strength attribute to its normal value.
effect: Restore Strength M points for D seconds
name: Restore Strength

description: Returns the target's Willpower attribute to its normal value.
effect: Restore Willpower M points for D seconds
name: Restore Willpower

description: Gives a M% chance that incoming spells will be absorbed, and their casting cost will be used to restore the target's Magicka pool instead of taking effect.
effect: Spell Absorption M points for D seconds
name: Spell Absorption

description: Allows the target to swim more quickly in the water.
effect: Swift Swim M points for D seconds
name: Swift Swim

description: Causes the target to be able to manipulate objects from a distance. The magnitude determines that maximum distance from which you can interact with objects.
effect: Telekinesis M feet for D seconds
name: Telekinesis

description: This effect is given by becoming a vampire. The actual effects of being a vampire are represented by their respective effects like any disease. Vampirism cannot be cured.
effect: Vampirism
name: Vampirism

description: Allows the target to breathe under water.
effect: Water Breathing for D seconds
name: Water Breathing

description: Allows the target to walk or run on water at normal speed, just as if it were solid ground.
effect: Water Walking for D seconds
name: Water Walking

description: Increases the damage dealt by Fire. M is the percentage of resistance reduction. At 100% the target will receive double damage.
effect: Weakness to Fire M% for D seconds
name: Weakness to Fire

description: Increases the damage dealt by Poison. M is the percentage of resistance reduction. At 100% the target will receive double damage.
effect: Weakness to Poison M% for D seconds
name: Weakness to Poison
